summary: This mod removes the falling Leaves/Pine Needles from the players view in Skyrim, which will increase FPS slightly.
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
zaczombies No Falling Leaves/Pine Needles mod Version 1.2
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Skyrim Special Edition version of this mod can be found at:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4982/?
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description:

Using the Skyrim CK I disabled the Leaf/Pine Needles camera effect
that displays falling Leaves whenever a tree is within view of the player.

I never understood why they would create a leaf with 64 animations
and with a large detailed texture considering no one looks at them
and it just taxes your PC.

The purpose behind this mod? To remove the Leaves/Pine Needles that
no one looks at, free up some Graphics Card/CPU usage and improve the
games performance.

You might see a slight performance increase in mods such as:

The Autumn of Whiterun, Skyrim Flora overhaul, BetterRiften.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements/Compatibility:

This mod needs the latest update for Skyrim and it has been
cleaned with TES5EDIT.
It should also be compatible with nearly anything since it only
turns off the leaves/pine needles.

Manual Install:

Install the mod into the Skyrim Data folder.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Usage:

You may also use this mod in yours as well.
I only ask that you give me credit for my work.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
v1.2 log:
Updated the readme to reflect 1.2 changes.
Removed the requirement of DLC Master Files since it never used them.
Small cred to "insaneplumber" for pointing that out.
Disabled the optional files since they are no longer needed.

v1.1 log:
Updated readme to reflect the requirements of DLC
and a manual install path.

Change one line for the pine needles that was missed.
author: zaczombie

files.name: NoFallingLeavesv1.1
files.changelogHtml:
1. Updated the readme to reflect the requirements of the mod.
2.Disabled a line for the Pine needles that was missed, although it seems that the game never used it.
